menu.author: Author
menu.demoInfo: The Demo version only contains one world pack.
menu.instructionText: After selecting a world pack, you will enter the character selection screen to learn about the world background and choose your character.

game.startPrompt: Please select a world pack from the menu to start.
game.connectionIntro: From here, you can go to:

dice.waitingForCheck: When your action requires a check, it will appear here.
dice.hintText: Some actions (like climbing, persuading, combat) may require a dice roll.

character.name: Name
character.selectWorldPrompt: Please select a world pack from the menu first, then return here to select a character.
character.nameHint: This is your name as a player, distinct from your character's name.
character.createSessionFirst: Please create a new session from the menu first, then return here to view character details.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure application preferences and AI settings
settings.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete provider "{{id}}"?
settings.noProviders: No providers available. Please add one first.
settings.idHint: Unique ID for internal reference. Lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only.
settings.errorProviderIdFormat: ID must consist of lowercase alphanumeric characters or hyphens, and cannot start or end with a hyphen.

agentDescs.gm: Core Narrative Engine. Handles story progression, scene description, and overall coordination.
agentDescs.npc: Roleplay Engine. Controls NPC dialogue, emotions, and interactions.
agentDescs.rule: Rules Judge. Handles dice checks, mechanics, and game logic.
agentDescs.lore: Knowledge Base. Retrieves world information and context.

saves.title: Save Management
saves.confirmLoad: Loading this save will replace your current progress. Continue?
saves.confirmDelete: Delete save "{{name}}"? This cannot be undone.
saves.limitReached: Save limit (10) reached. Delete old saves first.
saves.noSavesHint: After starting a game, you can create saves here.
saves.noActiveGameHint: Please start a new game from the menu first before creating a save.
